| icon           = poe2 palm_slats icon.png
| description    = Because palms do not form annual rings, these thin slats of lusterless wood are free from knots and similar defects. Due to the rarity of paper in the Deadfire, natives of the region prefer palm slats for writing surfaces. Such slats may be bound with thread to create easily stored volumes of writing.
